projects.title: Temp Out
projects.description:
A simple 2.5D game I've been developping to challenge myself to learn about 
the various elements that compose a video game (shaders, pathfinding, state 
machines, gameplay mechanics...). The player finds himself deep down a subway 
from which he has to escape to the top while going through rooms of enemies. 
Those rooms have the particularity to have random variations of the ambient 
temperature. It is possible to switch at any time between two characters who 
both have their own strengths and weaknesses.

projects.title: Physics Engine
projects.description:
Developpement of a very basic physics engine in order to get a more in-depth 
understanding of the major concepts inherent to game engines and game 
development.
